product_name: Appalachian Trail Conservancy Appalachian Trail Thru-Hike Planner - 5th Edition
long_description: The updated Appalachian Trail Thru-Hike Planner offers step-by-step preparation and time-tested advice to get you ready for a successful journey on the 2,184 mi. trail.
short_description: The updated Appalachian Trail Thru-Hike Planner offers step-by-step preparation and time-tested advice to get you ready for a successful journey on the 2,184 mi. trail.
